nodes.text: Cularin Central Finance was an organization that operated on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. Their main office was located in the city of Gadrin, on Cularin.

During the time of the Clone Wars, a criminal organization known as the Syndicate placed a transmitter inside Cularin Central Finance's main office, then implicated the Metatheran Cartel as being responsible for the device's presence there.
